cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world

Class ItemsBase

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.world.ItemsBase

  • public class ItemsBase
extends Object
    Class that stores all the in-game items.
    Author:
    kocur

    • Method Detail

      • preloadItem

        public static void preloadItem(String name,
                               int price,
                               int type)
        This function stores the item, without adding its components.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item.
        price - Price of the item.
        type - Type of the shop, that buys this item. Shop

      • loadItem

        public static void loadItem(String name,
                            String[] components)
        Loads item's components. This function will not throw if item or its component weren't found. The item base is quite big and one item without component is not a problem that would break the framework (it just needs to be logged and solved later).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item.
        components - It's components.

      • clear

        public static void clear()
        Clears the stored items.

      • getItem

        public static Item getItem(String name)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the item.
        Returns:
        Returns item with given name or null if the item doesn't exist inside the base.

      • getToString

        public static String getToString()
